name: @mozvr/aframe
description: Building blocks for the VR Web

scripts.build: mkdir -p build/ && npm run browserify -- --debug -o build/aframe.js && vulcanize --inline elements/templates/index.html > build/aframe.html
scripts.dist: mkdir -p dist/ && npm run browserify -- --debug -o dist/aframe.js && uglifyjs dist/aframe.js -c warnings=false -m -o dist/aframe.min.js && vulcanize --inline elements/templates/index.html > dist/aframe.html && vulcanize --inline elements/templates/index.html | html-minifier --minify-css --minify-js --collapse-whitespace > dist/aframe.min.html
scripts.preghpages: npm run dist && rm -rf gh-pages && mkdir -p gh-pages && cp -r {.nojekyll,dist,lib,examples,index.html,style} gh-pages/. && git checkout dist/ && replace 'build/aframe.js' 'dist/aframe.min.js' gh-pages/ -r --silent
scripts.release: npm login && npm version patch --minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
